00037 struct row_major    {};
00038 struct column_major {};

00040 // forward definitions
00041 template<typename Array, class Orientation> class array2d_view;
00042     
00043 namespace detail
00044 {
00045   // (i,j) -> major dimension
00046   // (i,j) -> minor dimension
00047   // logical n -> (i,j)
00048   // (i,j) -> logical n
00049   // (i,j) -> physical n
00050   // logical n -> physical n
00051   // logical n -> physical n (translated)
00052   
00053   template <typename IndexType>
00054   __host__ __device__
00055   IndexType minor_dimension(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, row_major)    { return num_cols; }
00056   
00057   template <typename IndexType>
00058   __host__ __device__
00059   IndexType minor_dimension(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, column_major) { return num_rows; }
00060 
00061   template <typename IndexType>
00062   __host__ __device__
00063   IndexType major_dimension(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, row_major)    { return num_rows; }
00064   
00065   template <typename IndexType>
00066   __host__ __device__
00067   IndexType major_dimension(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, column_major) { return num_cols; }
00068 
00069   // convert logical linear index into a logical (i,j) index
00070   template <typename IndexType>
00071   __host__ __device__
00072   IndexType linear_index_to_row_index(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, row_major)    { return linear_index / num_cols; }
00073       
00074   template <typename IndexType>
00075   __host__ __device__
00076   IndexType linear_index_to_col_index(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, row_major)    { return linear_index % num_cols; }
00077   
00078   template <typename IndexType>
00079   __host__ __device__
00080   IndexType linear_index_to_row_index(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, column_major)    { return linear_index % num_rows; }
00081       
00082   template <typename IndexType>
00083   __host__ __device__
00084   IndexType linear_index_to_col_index(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, column_major)    { return linear_index / num_rows; }
00085 
00086   // convert a logical (i,j) index into a physical linear index
00087   template <typename IndexType>
00088   __host__ __device__
00089   IndexType index_of(IndexType i, IndexType j, IndexType pitch, row_major)    { return i * pitch + j; }
00090       
00091   template <typename IndexType>
00092   __host__ __device__
00093   IndexType index_of(IndexType i, IndexType j, IndexType pitch, column_major) { return j * pitch + i; }
00094   
00095   template <typename IndexType, typename Orientation>
00096   __host__ __device__
00097   IndexType logical_to_physical(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, IndexType pitch, Orientation)
00098   {
00099     IndexType i = linear_index_to_row_index(linear_index, num_rows, num_cols, Orientation());
00100     IndexType j = linear_index_to_col_index(linear_index, num_rows, num_cols, Orientation());
00101     
00102     return index_of(i, j, pitch, Orientation());
00103   }
00104 
00105   // convert logical linear index in the source into a physical linear index in the destination
00106   template <typename IndexType, typename Orientation1, typename Orientation2>
00107   __host__ __device__
00108   IndexType logical_to_other_physical(IndexType linear_index, IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, IndexType pitch, Orientation1, Orientation2)
00109   { 
00110     IndexType i = linear_index_to_row_index(linear_index, num_rows, num_cols, Orientation1());
00111     IndexType j = linear_index_to_col_index(linear_index, num_rows, num_cols, Orientation1());
00112 
00113     return index_of(i, j, pitch, Orientation2());
00114   }
00115   
00116   // functors 
00117   template <typename IndexType, typename Orientation>
00118   struct logical_to_physical_functor : public thrust::unary_function<IndexType,IndexType>
00119   {
00120     IndexType num_rows, num_cols, pitch;
00121   
00122     logical_to_physical_functor(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, IndexType pitch)
00123       : num_rows(num_rows), num_cols(num_cols), pitch(pitch) {}
00124   
00125     __host__ __device__
00126     IndexType operator()(const IndexType i) const
00127     {
00128       return logical_to_physical(i, num_rows, num_cols, pitch, Orientation());
00129     }
00130   };
00131 
00132   template <typename IndexType, typename Orientation1, typename Orientation2>
00133   struct logical_to_other_physical_functor : public thrust::unary_function<IndexType,IndexType>
00134   {
00135     IndexType num_rows, num_cols, pitch;
00136   
00137     logical_to_other_physical_functor(IndexType num_rows, IndexType num_cols, IndexType pitch)
00138       : num_rows(num_rows), num_cols(num_cols), pitch(pitch) {}
00139   
00140     __host__ __device__
00141     IndexType operator()(const IndexType i) const
00142     {
00143       return logical_to_other_physical(i, num_rows, num_cols, pitch, Orientation1(), Orientation2());
00144     }
00145   };
00146   
00147   template <typename Iterator, class Orientation>
00148   struct row_view {};
00149 
00150   template <typename Iterator>
00151   struct row_view<Iterator,cusp::row_major> : public cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>
00152   {
00153     template <typename Array>
00154     row_view(Array& A, size_t n)
00155       : cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>(A.values.begin() + A.pitch * n,
00156                                      A.values.begin() + A.pitch * n + A.num_cols)
00157     {}
00158   };
00159   
00160   template <typename Iterator, class Orientation>
00161   struct column_view {};
00162 
00163   template <typename Iterator>
00164   struct column_view<Iterator,cusp::column_major> : public cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>
00165   {
00166     template <typename Array>
00167     column_view(Array& A, size_t n)
00168       : cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>(A.values.begin() + A.pitch * n,
00169                                      A.values.begin() + A.pitch * n + A.num_rows)
00170     {}
00171   };
00172 } // end namespace detail

00193 template<typename ValueType, class MemorySpace, class Orientation = cusp::row_major>
00194 class array2d : public cusp::detail::matrix_base<int,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::array2d_format>
00195 {
00196   typedef typename cusp::detail::matrix_base<int,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::array2d_format> Parent;
00197 
00198   public:
00199   typedef Orientation orientation;
00200 
00201   template<typename MemorySpace2>
00202     struct rebind { typedef cusp::array2d<ValueType, MemorySpace2, Orientation> type; };
00203   
00204   typedef typename cusp::array1d<ValueType, MemorySpace> values_array_type;
00205 
00208   typedef typename cusp::array2d<ValueType, MemorySpace, Orientation> container;
00209   
00212   typedef typename cusp::array2d_view<typename values_array_type::view, Orientation> view;
00213   
00216   typedef typename cusp::array2d_view<typename values_array_type::const_view, Orientation> const_view;
00217 
00220   typedef typename cusp::detail::row_view<typename values_array_type::iterator,Orientation> row_view;
00221   
00224   typedef typename cusp::detail::column_view<typename values_array_type::iterator,Orientation> column_view;
00225 
00226   values_array_type values;
00227 
00228   // minor_dimension + padding
00229   size_t pitch;
00230 
00231   // construct empty matrix
00232   array2d()
00233     : Parent(), pitch(0), values(0) {}
00234 
00235   // construct matrix with given shape and number of entries
00236   array2d(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols)
00237     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_rows * num_cols),
00238       pitch(cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation())),
00239       values(num_rows * num_cols) {}
00240 
00241   // construct matrix with given shape and number of entries and fill with a given value
00242   array2d(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, const ValueType& value)
00243     : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_rows * num_cols),
00244       pitch(cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation())),
00245       values(num_rows * num_cols, value) {}
00246 
00247   // construct from another matrix
00248   template <typename MatrixType>
00249   array2d(const MatrixType& matrix);
00250 
00251   typename values_array_type::reference operator()(const size_t i, const size_t j)
00252   { 
00253     return values[cusp::detail::index_of(i, j, pitch, orientation())];
00254   }
00255 
00256   typename values_array_type::const_reference operator()(const size_t i, const size_t j) const
00257   { 
00258     return values[cusp::detail::index_of(i, j, pitch, orientation())];
00259   }
00260 
00261   void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t pitch)
00262   {
00263     if (pitch < cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()))
00264       throw cusp::invalid_input_exception("pitch cannot be less than minor dimension");
00265 
00266     values.resize(pitch * cusp::detail::major_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()));
00267 
00268     this->num_rows    = num_rows;
00269     this->num_cols    = num_cols;
00270     this->pitch       = pitch; 
00271     this->num_entries = num_rows * num_cols;
00272   }
00273 
00274   void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols)
00275   {
00276     // preserve .pitch if possible
00277     if (this->num_rows == num_rows && this->num_cols == num_cols)
00278       return;
00279 
00280     resize(num_rows, num_cols, cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()));
00281   }
00282 
00283   void swap(array2d& matrix)
00284   {
00285     Parent::swap(matrix);
00286     thrust::swap(this->pitch, matrix.pitch);
00287     values.swap(matrix.values);
00288   }
00289 
00290   row_view row(size_t i)
00291   {
00292     return row_view(*this, i);
00293   }
00294   
00295   column_view column(size_t i)
00296   {
00297     return column_view(*this, i);
00298   }
00299   
00300   array2d& operator=(const array2d& matrix);
00301 
00302   template <typename MatrixType>
00303   array2d& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00304 
00305 }; // class array2d
00321 template<typename Array, class Orientation = cusp::row_major>
00322 class array2d_view : public cusp::detail::matrix_base<int, typename Array::value_type,typename Array::memory_space, cusp::array2d_format>
00323 {
00324   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<int, typename Array::value_type,typename Array::memory_space, cusp::array2d_format> Parent;
00325   public:
00326   typedef Orientation orientation;
00327 
00328   typedef Array values_array_type;
00329 
00330   values_array_type values;
00331   
00334   typedef typename cusp::array2d<typename Parent::value_type, typename Parent::memory_space, Orientation> container;
00335   
00338   typedef typename cusp::array2d_view<Array, Orientation> view;
00339 
00342   typedef typename cusp::detail::row_view<typename values_array_type::iterator,Orientation> row_view;
00343   
00346   typedef typename cusp::detail::column_view<typename values_array_type::iterator,Orientation> column_view;
00347   
00348   // minor_dimension + padding
00349   size_t pitch;
00350 
00351   // construct empty view
00352   array2d_view(void)
00353     : Parent(), values(0), pitch(0) {}
00354 
00355   array2d_view(const array2d_view& a)
00356     : Parent(a), values(a.values), pitch(a.pitch) {}
00357 
00358   // TODO handle different Orientation (pitch = major)
00359   //template <typename Array2, typename Orientation2>
00360   //array2d_view(const array2d_view<Array2,Orientation2>& A)
00361   
00362   // TODO check values.size()
00363 
00364   // construct from array2d container
00365   array2d_view(      array2d<typename Parent::value_type, typename Parent::memory_space, orientation>& a)
00366     : Parent(a), values(a.values), pitch(a.pitch) {}
00367 
00368   array2d_view(const array2d<typename Parent::value_type, typename Parent::memory_space, orientation>& a)
00369     : Parent(a), values(a.values), pitch(a.pitch) {}
00370 
00371   template <typename Array2>
00372   array2d_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t pitch, Array2& values)
00373    : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_rows * num_cols), pitch(pitch), values(values) {}
00374   
00375   template <typename Array2>
00376   array2d_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t pitch, const Array2& values)
00377    : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_rows * num_cols), pitch(pitch), values(values) {}
00378 
00379   typename values_array_type::reference operator()(const size_t i, const size_t j) const
00380   { 
00381     return values[detail::index_of(i, j, pitch, orientation())];
00382   }
00383 
00384   void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t pitch)
00385   {
00386     if (pitch < cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()))
00387       throw cusp::invalid_input_exception("pitch cannot be less than minor dimension");
00388 
00389     values.resize(pitch * cusp::detail::major_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()));
00390 
00391     this->num_rows    = num_rows;
00392     this->num_cols    = num_cols;
00393     this->pitch       = pitch; 
00394     this->num_entries = num_rows * num_cols;
00395   }
00396 
00397   void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols)
00398   {
00399     // preserve .pitch if possible
00400     if (this->num_rows == num_rows && this->num_cols == num_cols)
00401       return;
00402 
00403     resize(num_rows, num_cols, cusp::detail::minor_dimension(num_rows, num_cols, orientation()));
00404   }
00405   
00406   row_view row(size_t i) const
00407   {
00408     return row_view(*this, i);
00409   }
00410   
00411   column_view column(size_t i) const
00412   {
00413     return column_view(*this, i);
00414   }
00415 }; // class array2d_view

00419 template <typename Iterator, typename Orientation>
00420 array2d_view<typename cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>,Orientation>
00421 make_array2d_view(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t pitch, const cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>& values, Orientation)
00422 {
00423   return array2d_view<typename cusp::array1d_view<Iterator>,Orientation>(num_rows, num_cols, pitch, values);
00424 }
00425   
00426 template <typename Array, typename Orientation>
00427 array2d_view<Array,Orientation>
00428 make_array2d_view(const array2d_view<Array, Orientation>& a)
00429 {
00430   return array2d_view<Array,Orientation>(a);
00431 }
00432 
00433 template<typename ValueType, class MemorySpace, class Orientation>
00434 array2d_view<typename cusp::array1d_view<typename cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace>::iterator >, Orientation>
00435 make_array2d_view(cusp::array2d<ValueType,MemorySpace,Orientation>& a)
00436 {
00437   return cusp::make_array2d_view(a.num_rows, a.num_cols, a.pitch, cusp::make_array1d_view(a.values), Orientation());
00438 }
00439 
00440 template<typename ValueType, class MemorySpace, class Orientation>
00441 array2d_view<typename cusp::array1d_view<typename cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace>::const_iterator >, Orientation>
00442 make_array2d_view(const cusp::array2d<ValueType,MemorySpace,Orientation>& a)
00443 {
00444   return cusp::make_array2d_view(a.num_rows, a.num_cols, a.pitch, cusp::make_array1d_view(a.values), Orientation());
00445 }
